com.billy.android.loading

接口 Gloading.Adapter

  • 封闭类:
    Gloading

    public static interface Gloading.Adapter
    Provides view to show current loading status

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      android.view.View getView(Gloading.Holder holder, android.view.View convertView, int status)
      get view for current status

    • 方法详细资料

      • getView

        android.view.View getView(Gloading.Holder holder,
                          android.view.View convertView,
                          int status)
        get view for current status
        参数:
        holder - Holder
        convertView - The old view to reuse, if possible.
        status - current status
        返回:
        status view to show. Maybe convertView for reuse.
        另请参阅:
        Gloading.Holder
